response: "{ \"title\": \"Hard: Maximize the Sum of Distinct Elements\", \"description\": \"You are given a list of integers where each integer represents the number of distinct elements in an array. The goal is to maximize the sum of distinct elements by merging arrays from left to right.\\n\\n#### Function Signature\\n```python\\ndef maximize_sum(arr: list) -> int:\\n```\\n\\n#### Input\\n- `arr` (list): A list of integers where each integer represents the number of distinct elements in an array.\\n\\n#### Output\\n- Returns the maximum sum of distinct elements that can be achieved by merging arrays from left to right.\\n\\n\", \"code\": \"\\ndef maximize_sum(arr: list) -> int:\\n    n = len(arr)\\n    dp = [0] * (n + 1)\\n    \\n    for i in range(n):\\n        if arr[i] == 0:\\n            dp[i + 1] = dp[i]\\n        else:\\n            dp[i + 1] = max(dp[i], dp[i - 1] + arr[i])\\n    \\n    return dp[n]\\n\", \"tests\": [\"assert maximize_sum([3, 2, 5]) == 7\", \"assert maximize_sum([0, 1, 2, 1]) == 4\", \"assert maximize_sum([10, 10, 10]) == 20\"] }"
